TopicTitle: [1.0] MP-3 Antlion Multipurpose Aircraft (United Aces of Jebediah)

Articles.Content:
By 

[![53x1I9c.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/53x1I9c.png?1)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118553-United-Aces-of-Jebediah-Engineering-Corps-NOW-HIRING)

* * *
![2WV1diy.png](http://i.imgur.com/2WV1diy.png)

From the Untied Aces of Jebediah; engineering corps comes the MP-3 "Antlion" Series. Not meant as a successor to the MP-2 "Seahorse" series, but rather a faster alternative.

-MP-3 is the base model, for all your base model needs.

-MP-3T is the tanker model for long distance flights and refueling (and you know well what those tanks could be used for.)

-MP-3X is the Experimental model, which has a VTOL system installled.

-MP-3KC is the Kerbal Carrier for transporting8 Kerbals (plus the pilot) around

-MP-3S is the Science model, which has a science rover that can be deployed on landing.

![CxXzRHj.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/CxXzRHj.jpg)

[MP-3](http://www./download/zwlu2fb7c5orn3r/MP-3_Antlion.craft) Specs:

Weight: 9.6 Tons

Parts: 49

Fuel: 408

Top Speed: 325 M/S

Price: $28,838

![sVI42qu.png](http://i.imgur.com/sVI42qu.png)
